pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:0.6: Ime kho panāyasmanto tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati gotamake cetiye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ ticīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.3: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—“bhagavatā ticīvaraṃ anuññātan”ti aññeneva ticīvarena gāmaṃ pavisanti, aññena ticīvarena ārāme acchanti, aññena ticīvarena nahānaṃ otaranti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.10: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, atirekacīvaraṃ dhāressatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.12: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.13: “Yo pana bhikkhu atirekacīvaraṃ dhāreyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.14: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.15: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato ānandassa atirekacīvaraṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.16: Āyasmā ca ānando taṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.25: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.28: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.30: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:1.31: “Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.1.2: bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ kataṃ vā hoti naṭṭhaṃ vā vinaṭṭhaṃ vā daḍḍhaṃ vā cīvarāsā vā upacchinnā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.1.4: aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarāya mātikāya ubbhataṃ hoti, saṃghena vā antarā ubbhataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.1.10: channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ, vikappanupagaṃ pacchimaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.2.3: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.2.5: Tena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.2.12: Idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṃghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.2.13: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.2.14: Tena bhikkhunā sambahule bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.2.21: Idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ āyasmantānaṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.2.22: Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:3.2.23: Tena bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:4.11: Nissaggiyaṃ cīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:4.16: antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nissaṭṭhacīvaraṃ na denti.
